ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Aha that s the trick then? A bag... well I will try this the next time I m on.. I tried with /consent.... didn t work :-( And the robe was lost (didn t
ygData.messageBody:
On 20 Jul, mstokes wrote:
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> I'm not sure if this trick still works, but its worth a shot. Have your DE
> friend buy a robe for you, then stick it into a bag. You should be able to
> then trade the bag.

Aha that's the trick then? A bag... well I will try this the next time
I'm on.. I tried with /consent.... didn't work :-( And the robe was
lost (didn't fetch the corpse in time, almost 4pp gone :-( ). But it's
worth it if I can only get a nice somewhat different robe... :-)

I will post the results here sometime later this week I hope..

Are there any other nice robes available for my lvl (12)? Appearence is
important for my character.. :-)

//Shulinar, high elf wizard (lvl 12), Rodcet nife.
